entities.name: george
entities.description: George is one of the Weasley twins. He is mentioned as correcting Hermione's mistake about O.W.L. grades.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan is a student who is sitting at Harry's table. He is mentioned as making a joke about P standing for 'Poor'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is mentioned as feeling his face grow warm and faking a coughing fit to avoid talking about O.W.L. grades.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who is sitting at Harry's table. She is mentioned as explaining the meaning of different O.W.L. grades to her friends.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the Weasley twins. He is mentioned by George as someone who exceeded expectations just by turning up for exams.

relationships.description: George corrects Hermione's mistake about O.W.L. grades, specifically the meaning of E and A.
Lee Jordan makes a joke about P standing for 'Poor' while sitting next to Harry at the table.
George and Fred are brothers, as mentioned by George in his joke about exceeding expectations just by turning up for exams.
